blogPost.excerpt: Console is a free weekly email digest of the best tools and beta releases for developers. We keep track of everything - dev tools, devops, cloud, and APIs - so you don't have to.
blogPost.body: Console is a free weekly email digest of the best tools and beta releases for developers. We keep track of everything - dev tools, devops, cloud, and APIs - so you don't have to.

localize.description: Console是一个免费的每周电子邮件摘要，为开发者提供最好的工具和测试版本。我们跟踪一切--开发工具、devops、云和API--所以你不必跟踪。

localize.description: Console是一個免費的每週電子郵件摘要，爲開發者提供最好的工具和測試版本。我們跟蹤一切--開發工具、devops、雲和API--所以你不必跟蹤。

previous.excerpt: CoinGecko provides a fundamental analysis of the crypto market. In addition to tracking price, volume and market capitalization, CoinGecko tracks community growth, open-source code development, major events and on-chain metrics.
previous.title: CoinGecko - 360-degree overview of the crypto market

localize.description: CoinGecko提供加密市场的基本分析。除了跟踪价格、交易量和市值，CoinGecko还跟踪社区增长、开源代码开发、重大事件和链上指标。
CoinGecko提供加密市場的基本分析。除了跟蹤價格、交易量和市值，CoinGecko還跟蹤社區增長、開源代碼開發、重大事件和鏈上指標。
